thread.title: Esha Gupta bitten by the mountain climbing bug
thread.title_full: Esha Gupta bitten by the mountain climbing bug - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Esha Gupta bitten by the mountain climbing bug
text:
The mountain bug has bitten Esha Gupta . The 'Humshakals' (2014) actress, who's shooting for a South flick, is keen to head to the hills.

Esha Gupta 
She recently saw a film about mountaineering which introduced her to mountain climbing. For starters, Esha plans to go trekking and Malshej Ghat is on her mind.
